summary: This document is an email chain from April 13, 2020, between U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) staff. The emails discuss coordinating case updates, specifically mentioning an Epstein-related team and the anticipation of an indictment. They also discuss organizing a unit meeting.

events.title: Anticipated Epstein indictment
events.description: An email mentions an indictment related to Epstein is "supposed to be this week."

events.title: Email coordination on case updates
events.description: USANYS staff exchange emails about organizing updates, specifically mentioning the "Epstein team" and nudging progress on drafting a complaint.

keyFacts: The emails are internal communications within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS).
An indictment related to the Epstein case was anticipated for the week of April 13, 2020.
A specific "Epstein team" is referenced as a subject for updates during a proposed unit meeting.
The emails indicate a complaint related to the Epstein matter was discussed for drafting a month prior, with no follow-up heard since.
All sender and recipient names in the email headers are redacted, indicated by "(USANYS)".
